00027     bool TextFeatureWriter:: write(const FeatureHeader& hdr,
00028                                    const Extractor::featureArrayType& featureArray)
00029     {
00030         if (featureArray.empty())
00031         {
00032             throw Exception("Empty feature array!");
00033         }
00034 
00035         std::ofstream ofs(m_filename.c_str());
00036         ofs << "# Generated with: Aquila v. " << VERSION << "\n" <<
00037                "# Original wave file: "       << hdr.wavFilename << "\n" <<
00038                "# Audio sampling frequency: " << "?????" << "\n" <<
00039                "# Frame length: "             << hdr.frameLength << "\n" <<
00040                "# Frames count: "             << featureArray.size() << "\n" <<
00041                "# Parameters type: "          << hdr.type << "\n" <<
00042                "# Parameters per frame: "     << hdr.paramsPerFrame << "\n" <<
00043                "# Save timestamp: "           << hdr.timestamp<< "\n";
00044         ofs.precision(13);
00045         for (unsigned int i = 0, size = featureArray.size(); i < size; ++i)
00046         {
00047             ofs << "#frame: " << i << "\n";
00048             for (unsigned int j = 0; j < hdr.paramsPerFrame; ++j)
00049             {
00050                 ofs << featureArray[i][j] << "\n";
00051             }
00052         }
00053         ofs.close();
00054 
00055         return true;
00056     }
00057 }
